casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Gofery Larin HANKINS. No. 701P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 27, 2005. Michelle F. Lynch, for Gofery Larin Hankins. Rex Gore, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of December 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 27th day of December 2005."
